Ci#ndantiq yanma#ddhyaqtaH prAqSnantyaqdBi-rmA$rjayantaq ApOq vai sarvA# dEqvatA# dEqvatA#BirEqva yaqj~ja(gm) saM ta#nvanti dEqvA vai yaqj~jAd-ruqdramaqntarA#yaqnthsa yaqj~jama#viddhyaqt taM dEqvA aqBi sama#gacCantaq kalpa#tAM na iqdamitiq 
tE$&bruvaqnth svi#ShTaqM ~Mvai na# iqdaM Ba#viShyatiq yadiqma(gm) rA#dhayiqShyAmaq itiq tath svi#ShTaqkRuta#H sviShTakRuqttvaM tasyA &&vi#ddhaqM ni - [  ]  44
